<p>Can you feel the cool breeze? KottabosGames can. Watch some KSP gameplay with the Kerbal Wind mod installed.</p>
Being the featured video, does this mean there is a chance that with the new aerodynamics overhaul, a weather system might be possible to get included?

Being the featured video, does this mean there is a chance that with the new aerodynamics overhaul, a weather system might be possible to get included?

That's a completely different beast.
I can see a future for this in multiplayer boat races. Will definitely have a play around today!
